trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_SEQ_00<tab>Papawazu would offer you another commission and a chance to admire him, if the mood strikes you.

TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_SEQ_01<tab>The shipment of processed ceruleum will finally resume, to the satisfaction of all parties─well, except the coblyns, but creatures of their sort have no say, and dead ones doubly so. Report the news to Syntgoht at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange.
TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_SEQ_02<tab>Syntgoht is relieved, though vexed by the price hike. Once the goods reach him in a few days, he should in turn be able to fill his orders.
TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Syntgoht at the Sapphire Avenue Exchange.

TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_PAPAWAZU_000_000<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Any<var 1A 01 /var>way! The ceruleum must flow. No more delays in shipping─another brilliant coup by Papawazu! Oh, is that a feather? For my cap? Why, thank you very much!

TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_PAPAWAZU_000_001<tab>Sooo, you can tell Syntgoht that his shipment will be there in just a few days. <var 1A 02 /var>Un<var 1A 01 /var>fortunately, there'll be a wee increase in price. Security surcharge, you know! Everybody does it.

TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_SYNTGOHT_000_010<tab>Welcome, <var 1A 02 /var>welcome<var 1A 01 /var>! What might a discerning─oh, it's you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Talked to Papawazu? Really! He said a matter of days?

TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_SYNTGOHT_000_011<tab>So, my dear <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var>, you're telling me they're shipping what's owed me but charging more for it. I wish Amajina and <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> his sons the joy of my gil. I hope it gives them gout.

TEXT_GAIUSB813_00922_SYNTGOHT_000_012<tab>I do appreciate you sorting this out, and with that puttock Papawazu, no less. A discerning middleman such as myself will certainly remember you for future commissions!
